! THERE IS A BUG IN BOSS FIGHT WHERE THE BOSS GETS STUCK IN THE WALL. IF THIS HAPPENS HOLD SPACE BAR.

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/564458257/

^You can also play here!

Bounce N Chaos is a game by WilderNaut and Trooper_31, made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021 in one week. Dodge your own bullets and kill deadly enemies!

-WASD to move

-Mouse to aim

There are 3 waves and a boss. Each wave you get an upgrade that makes the game easier, but also harder.

-Art and code by WilderNaut and

Trooper_31

-Music by How2Boss

-Thumbnail by Skellien

-Downwell for inspiration

ok i think thats all

enjoy :)
